controller.interfaces

Interface IControllerManageArtworkExhibit

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ControllerManageArtworkExhibit

    public interface IControllerManageArtworkExhibit
    The interface for the ControllerManageArtworkExhibit.
    Author:
    Elisa Casadio

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void commandAdd(int index)
      Adds a new artwork to the exhibit by saving its code.
      void commandDelete(int index)
      Deletes the selected artwork by the exhibit.

    • Method Detail

      • commandAdd

        void commandAdd(int index)
        Adds a new artwork to the exhibit by saving its code. Displays an error message if the user wants change the list of the artworks when the exhibit has already finished or when the artwork that the user wants to add is already in the list.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the artwork in the archive of the artworks.

      • commandDelete

        void commandDelete(int index)
        Deletes the selected artwork by the exhibit. Displays an error message if the user wants to delete an artwork when the exhibit has already finished.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the artwork in the exhibit.
